title: The Patriots' Play-Callers
description:
Field Yates and the NFL Live crew discuss Zack Wilson’s successful surgery, the Patriots not naming an OC for the season, the Panthers’ ongoing QB competition, Frank Reich’s comments on Jonathan Taylor’s role this season and the Cowboys’ penalties against the Broncos. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Zach Wilson's successful surgery and the Patriots haven't named an offensive coordinator.
